page.title: 17THE VILLAGE OF MICKLETHWAITE
page.content: Micklethwaite is a quaint little village,it is situated on the side of a valley the aire valley.Micklethwaite is also a great place for picnics There are lots of old houses for people who are interested in architecture.Although Micklethwaite doesnt have many shops it is easy to get to places.The town of Bingley is quite near to Micklethwaite East Morton village is also very near A shop that is in Micklethwaite is called Holroyd Mill,Holroyd Mill sells reproduction and modern furniture by Richard Cotton and Robert Ellwood hand made papers and commissioned weaving by Penny Johnson porcelain jewellery and clocks by Caroline Hird fine batik pictures by Geoff Greenwood water colours,greetings cards
